images.description: An action-adventure game where players control Link on a quest to rescue Princess Zelda and the kingdom of Hyrule from the evil Ganon, exploring dungeons, solving puzzles, and battling enemies.
An action-adventure series following treasure hunter Nathan Drake as he explores lost cities and ancient mysteries, combining third-person shooting, climbing, and puzzle-solving.
A crossover action RPG featuring Disney and Final Fantasy characters, where players control Sora in his battle against dark forces across various Disney worlds.

An iconic platforming series starring Mario, an Italian plumber who ventures through Mushroom Kingdom to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, navigating imaginative levels filled with obstacles and enemies.
A stealth-action game featuring Sam Fisher, a covert operative who uses gadgets and tactical espionage to neutralize threats, with an emphasis on stealth and avoiding detection.

An open-world street racing game set in Los Angeles, where players race through the city’s streets in customizable cars and motorcycles, competing in illegal races to become the ultimate street racer.
An open-world action game where players control Cole MacGrath, a character with electrical superpowers, navigating a city and choosing between hero and anti-hero paths.
A sports simulation game including tennis, baseball, bowling, golf, and boxing, showcasing the motion-sensing capabilities of the Wii by allowing players to mimic real-life movements.

A crossover fighting game featuring characters from various Nintendo and third-party franchises, where players compete in battle arenas with special abilities and items to knock opponents off the screen.

An open-world action game where players control Sgt. James Heller, a superhuman with shapeshifting abilities, seeking revenge against the virus-infected Alex Mercer in a dark version of New York City.
An action RPG set in the EverQuest universe, where players choose a class and embark on quests to save Norrath from evil forces, featuring cooperative multiplayer and character customization.
A weapon-based fighting game with 3D movement, focusing on characters searching for the powerful Soul Edge weapon, known for its fluid gameplay and high-quality graphics for the time.

A platforming game inspired by Disney “Fantasia,” where players control Mickey Mouse through magical, music-themed levels to retrieve musical notes stolen by an evil sorcerer, overcoming obstacles and enemies.
